main event: A white, oblong object, resembling the size of a matchhead, was observed over Hachijo-Jima Island for 10 seconds before disappearing.
interesting points: The object's flight path and description were similar to that of a balloon,The sighting duration was noted to be only 10 seconds,The object was characterized as having a straight trajectory,The report indicated no special equipment was utilized during the observation,Conclusions drawn included possibilities ranging from a balloon to something astronomical.
